special-quality.name: Glasses
special-quality.description: You wear glasses, and can’t use contact lenses. The frame design can be whatever you want, and this can include a monocle.

special-quality.name: Sickly
special-quality.description: You’ve got an incurable disease. However, this doesn’t adversely affect your attributes.

special-quality.name: Royalty
special-quality.description: You’re among the heads of a country or organization, and as a result your life is often put in danger.

special-quality.name: Quiet
special-quality.description: Strangely different from the “Cool” Maid Type. No, there are no rules regarding how often you speak.

special-quality.name: My Pace
special-quality.description: You like to live life at your own particular tempo, and you’re always calm and laid-back. This does not affect your attributes.

special-quality.name: OCD
special-quality.description: You’re obsessed with hygiene management. You can’t let the slighted bit of dirt pass.

special-quality.name: Brown Skin
special-quality.description: Your skin is a dark brown color, either naturally or because of tanning.

special-quality.name: Albino
special-quality.description: You have no pigment. You’re not necessarily completely colorless, and this can simply be a very pale complexion.

special-quality.name: Shy
special-quality.description: You’re very shy. Don’t forget to remain silent when encountering NPCs you haven’t met before.

special-quality.name: Cross-Dresser
special-quality.description: You outwardly appear to be of the opposite sex, which gives you a kind of perverse allure.

special-quality.name: Imagination
special-quality.description: You frequently get caught up in your own imaginary world.

special-quality.name: Hermaphrodite
special-quality.description: You’re both male and female. The player can decide which is the base sex.

special-quality.name: Bishonen
special-quality.description: Not only are you attractive, but women - and men - adore you. There’s a good chance that you’re also romantically attracted to members of the same sex.

special-quality.name: Noble Hair
special-quality.description: Your hair is done up in long rolls, your beard is very aristocratic, or you otherwise have hair that your position amongst nobility.

special-quality.name: Hedonist
special-quality.description: You only care about being able to passively enjoy life, or to put it nicely, you have no prejudices to speak of.

special-quality.name: Vampire
special-quality.description: You are a vampire, with long fangs. Be sure to act... vampiric.

special-quality.name: Otaku
special-quality.description: You have some obsession that you tirelessly pursue, with little or no regard for common sense.

special-quality.name: Angel/Devil
special-quality.description: You are a being from another world charged with judging good and evil. The design and the details of your origins are up to you.

special-quality.name: Lecherous
special-quality.description: Sexual harassment isn’t just a crime, it’s a way of life.

special-quality.name: Sadist
special-quality.description: You’re excited by causing pain and suffering to others.

special-quality.name: Masochist
special-quality.description: You’re excited by being caused pain and suffering by others.

special-quality.name: Handicapped
special-quality.description: You can only move around on your own with a wheelchair, or you might even outright be confined to your bed.

special-quality.name: Scars
special-quality.description: Your face, back, etc. are covered with painful-looking scars.

special-quality.name: Kidnapped
special-quality.description: You were once kidnapped and held for 1D6 days. Even today it remains a scar in your heart.

special-quality.name: Capable Sibling
special-quality.description: You have a sibling who excels at seemingly everything. You’re tormented by an inferiority complex.

special-quality.name: Family Hate
special-quality.description: You despise one or more of your parents or siblings. The GM can decide what if anything happened in the past.

special-quality.name: Professional Criminal
special-quality.description: You’re a professional criminal, and most of your assets no doubt came from ill-gotten gains.

special-quality.name: Amnesiac
special-quality.description: You’ve lost your memories from when you were very young. (The GM should come up with something to reveal during the game).

special-quality.name: Artist
special-quality.description: You are a musician, painter, writer, actor, singer, composer, or some other kind of highly talented artist.

special-quality.name: Evil Emperor
special-quality.description: You are the leader of an evil kingdom or secret society, or the leader of a group aimed at tearing down society.

special-quality.name: Undead
special-quality.description: Despite your rotting body, you live on. This can be a mummy, zombie, lich, etc.

special-quality.name: Scientist
special-quality.description: You are a scientist who freely commands advanced technology, and who dabbled in countless fields.

special-quality.name: Oracle
special-quality.description: You can predict the future to a certain degree. There are any number of possible ways this can be carried out, and the player is free to define how their character does so.

special-quality.name: Magician
special-quality.description: You wield sorcerous powers, in the matter of a typical fantasy wizard.

special-quality.name: Priest
special-quality.description: You are a priest of some religion or other.

special-quality.name: Maid Quality
special-quality.description: Roll 1D66 and re-roll the tens digit if it’s less than 4, so you get a result from 41-66 from the Maid Special Quality table.
